verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_2: Then bring out spark of fire from stone by striking their hoofs.
verse.verse_4: Then at time they raise clouds of dust.
verse.verse_5: Then penetrate into the centre of the forces of enemy.
verse.verse_6: Undoubtedly, man is greatly unthankful to his Lord.
verse.verse_7: And undoubtedly, he is himself a witness over it.
verse.verse_8: And undoubtedly, he is strong in the love of wealth.
verse.verse_9: Does he not know when those that are in graves shall be raised?
verse.verse_10: And that which is in the breasts shall be opened?
verse.verse_11: Undoubtedly, their Lord on that day is fully aware of them.
